name: The Silence (itch) (DaDarkEnaxel)
description:
Terrence is a teenager,  identified Covid-19 +ve. He is in a 14 days isolation.

It has already been one week,  but now the situation is becoming worse. He is getting weak, and suspecting there is a monster in the house. Is it real? or just a figment of his imagination?

--------------

For those who got lost into this surreal experience, here is the walkthrough -
